Serialized Form

  • Package view

    • Class view.Canvas extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • grid

          view.Grid grid
          the grid that is drawn on the canvas

        • minSize

          java.awt.Dimension minSize
          the minimal size of the Canvas

        • figures

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> figures
          the HashMap that stores all the figures currently drawn on the canvas. The key is the figure's id.

        • arc_figure_ids

          java.util.ArrayList<E> arc_figure_ids
          stores the ids of all ArcFigures currently drawn on Canvas.

        • label_figure_ids

          java.util.ArrayList<E> label_figure_ids
          stores the ids of all LabelFigures currently drawn on Canvas.

        • place_and_transition_figure_ids

          java.util.ArrayList<E> place_and_transition_figure_ids
          stores the ids of all Place- and TransitionFigures currently drawn on Canvas.

    • Class view.MainWindow extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • editorBackgroundColor

          java.awt.Color editorBackgroundColor
          the background color of the canvasPane

        • canvasPane

          javax.swing.JScrollPane canvasPane
          the scrollpane that contains the canvas

        • canvas

          Canvas canvas
          the canvas that the petrinet is drawn upon

        • statusbar

          javax.swing.JLabel statusbar
          the statusbar on the bottom of the window

        • fileFunctions

          java.lang.Object[][] fileFunctions
          the File related functionality (displayed as buttons and menu entries) encoded as Object: {id, tooltipText} the id will also be used to bind the functionality

        • optionsFunctions

          java.lang.Object[][] optionsFunctions

        • modeFunctions

          java.lang.Object[][] modeFunctions
          the ActionMode related functionality (displayed as buttons) encoded as Object: {id, tooltipText} the id will also be used to bind the functionality
